edu.uprm.ece.icom4035.mycontacts.managers

Class Contact.Address

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.uprm.ece.icom4035.mycontacts.managers.Contact.Address
  • Enclosing class:
    Contact

    public class Contact.Address
extends java.lang.Object
    Address is a basic data structure that stores address details in an array.

    Description

    This is an implementation of an data type which handles specific information for each instance created, provided that the array with whom it was initialized is unique (not a reference to a previously provided array).

    • Field Detail

      • TOTAL_ADDRESS_DETAILS

        public static final int TOTAL_ADDRESS_DETAILS
        Represents the maximum amount of fields each instance of a Address can support. To be used during initialization of the string array to be passed during initialization of each Contact instance.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • getAddressDetails

        public java.lang.String[] getAddressDetails()
        Returns:
        A String Array with the details of an Address instance.

      • getAddressSpecificDetail

        public java.lang.String getAddressSpecificDetail(int fieldIndex)
        Parameters:
        fieldIndex - The index of the desired specific detail. Should use the static fields provided by the class for this method. Expects a value within the range 0 to TOTAL_ADDRESS_DETAILS.
        Returns:
        A specific detail of an Address instance.
